## About Me

Hey, I'm Pranav! I most recently worked as an AI/ML vulnerability researcher at [Cromulence](https://www.cromulence.com), building and fine-tuning LLMs for code generation and document translation in air-gapped environments.

Outside of work, I've been building [STEM Network](projects.qmd) — a city-scale IoT sensor network for monitoring urban street trees that won 1st place globally at Microsoft's Azure IoT hackathon and landed real deployment funding from the City of Boulder.

I'm into the full stack of ML: from data curation pipelines and LoRA fine-tuning all the way down to embedded systems and LoRaWAN gateways.

[Get in touch](mailto:pranavbhusari2013@gmail.com){.btn .btn-primary} [View experience](experience.qmd){.btn .btn-outline-secondary}
